name: Clock Changer 1
description:
Next Version of Clock Changer.

In this Version I tried to add more features and solve any bugs and add more graphics and add sound and music.

some feature: 1.Clock hands are movable after LEVEL 2. 2.attention to increase and decrease under main numbers.

Manage your time before it's end. Don't Run in full screen.

if you like this game please rate it.

if you want to add features in the next version or you have any Idea about this please say in comments.

Hope You Enjoy it.
